name: The Worm (itch) (jaquesoler)
description:
Help a telekinetic worm grow and devour the universe! 

Click and drag enemies to defend from bullets, crash against other enemies or feed them to the worm .

How to play:

Left Mouse Button: Drag enemies 

W / UP - Move up

S / DOWN - Move down.

Made in 48h for the MASH UP GAME JAM - 2020. Size Matters!
